30#include <sys/types.h>
31#include "crc32.h"

99
100u_int32_t
101ssh_crc32(const u_char *buf, u_int32_t size)
102{
103 u_int32_t i, crc;
104
105 crc = 0;
106 for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
107 crc = crc32tab[(crc ^ buf[i]) & 0xff] ^ (crc >> 8);
108 return crc;
109}
